name: CS2 Surf Server

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# CS2 Surf Server Installation Script

cd /mnt/server

# Download installation script
curl -o install.sh https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Nanaimo2013/Nans-Surf-Cs2/main/install.sh

# Make it executable
chmod +x install.sh

# Run installation
./install.sh
